Metadata.Title: CVE-2024-43806 affecting package virtiofsd for versions less than 1.8.0-3
Metadata.Description: CVE-2024-43806 affecting package virtiofsd for versions less than 1.8.0-3. A patched version of the package is available.

Criterion.Comment: Package virtiofsd is earlier than 1.8.0-3, affected by CVE-2024-43806
